EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_ Ensuring Cloud Native Success: The Greenfield Journey_Q415.Sorry
EmailTemplate.subject: We're sorry. We experienced technical issues today.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Not able to join the webinar today? Us either! We experienced some technical difficulties today during our Ensuring Cloud Native Success: The Greenfield Journey webinar. We are very sorry for the inconvenience and we will make a on demand version of the session available to you as soon as possible.
Thank you for your understanding,
The Pivotal Team
